ygData.subject: Re: Language
ygData.msgSnippet: Friend of mine is a L17 ranger on Fennin.  He says that he has found words from scarecrows.  He also says that he s usually hunted in BlackBurrow, and lo and
ygData.messageBody:
Friend of mine is a L17 ranger on Fennin. He says that he has found
words from scarecrows. He also says that he's usually hunted in
BlackBurrow, and lo and behold, he went to his guildmaster, looked
at what he could train in, and he has the Gnoll language skill (?)

I played a troll at one point, was in a group, and we used the /g
command extensively. Lo and behold it said, "You have become
better at Troll!" or something to the sort.

I assume partying with an erudite or going to erudin would help
start the fundamentals of the language.

David Robinson wrote:
>
> From: David Robinson <daverobinson@...>
>
> What about magic users??? what lang are they in...
>
> I know Wiz use runes
> and necro use words.
> what do mages use?
>
> Jeremy Foster wrote:
> >
> > From: Jeremy Foster <jcf95v@...>
> >
> > I'm not sure, but I've heard a rumor that necro spells are all in Old Erudite.
> > Teldarien
